triples.name: Dialogue system
triples.relevance: The paper surveys neural approaches for building intelligent open-domain dialogue systems.

triples.name: Natural language processing
triples.relevance: NLP is fundamental to understanding and generating conversational content in dialogue systems.

triples.name: Deep learning
triples.relevance: Neural approaches based on deep learning are the core methods reviewed in the paper.

triples.name: Recurrent neural network
triples.relevance: RNNs are key neural architectures used in conversational AI for processing sequential dialogue data.

triples.name: Seq2seq
triples.relevance: Sequence-to-sequence models are fundamental neural architectures for dialogue response generation.

triples.name: Neural machine translation
triples.relevance: NMT techniques like encoder-decoder architectures are applied to dialogue generation tasks.

triples.name: Natural language understanding
triples.relevance: Understanding user semantics and emotional/social needs is a core challenge in the paper.

triples.name: Sentiment analysis
triples.relevance: Sentiment analysis helps dialogue systems identify users' emotional states during conversation.

triples.name: Emotion recognition
triples.relevance: Recognizing and responding to emotions is part of the semantic understanding challenge discussed.

triples.name: Chatbot
triples.relevance: Chatbots and dialogue systems are the primary application area reviewed in this survey.
